EmailTemplate.subject: Tax document request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email. These tax documents are currently being generated. We have until January 31st to complete these and mail/upload these documents, and they are typically available within the last week of the month. You will see these uploaded to your eBranch by January 31st.
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day!
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
{!Case.OwnerTitle}
Idaho Central Credit Union
Eastern Idaho 208-478-3300
Treasure Valley 208-846-7000
Magic Valley 208-733-4777
www.iccu.com
Helping members achieve financial success.
